name: _id
description: The unique identifier of the object that generated the log (transaction, smart contract result).

name: address
description: The address in bech32 encoding. It can be the address of the smart contract that generated the log or the address of the transaction's receiver.

fields.name: address
fields.description: The address in bech32 encoding. It can be the address of the smart contract that generated the event or the address of the transaction's receiver.

fields.name: data
fields.description: The data field can contain information added by the smart contract that generated the event.

fields.name: additionalData
fields.description: Additional data captured by the event.

fields.name: topics
fields.description: A list with extra information. They don't have a specific order because the smart contract is free to log anything that could be helpful.

fields.name: order
fields.description: The index of the event indicating the execution order.

name: originalTxHash
description: The hash of the initial transaction.

name: timestamp
description: The timestamp of the block in which the log was generated.
